example_sentence_english: I want to see the movie tonight.
I used to see that dog often.

translation_english: he was seeing/she was seeing/you (formal) were seeing

example_sentence_italian: Noi vedevamo il film ogni settimana.
example_sentence_english: We used to see the film every week.
You often used to see the fireworks.

example_sentence_italian: Loro vedevano la costa dalla barca.
example_sentence_english: They were seeing the coast from the boat.
